metadata.title: CVE-2021-3750 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: hcd-ehci: DMA reentrancy issue leads to use-after-free

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-01-05, the proposed patches have not been committed into the upstream tree

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
